mapper.select: SELECT id, name, contact, contact_phone, address, email FROM company LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}
SELECT id, name, contact, contact_phone, address, email FROM company WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT id, name, contact, contact_phone, address, email FROM company WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO company (id, name, contact, contact_phone, address, email) VALUE (#{id}, #{name}, #{contact}, #{contactPhone}, #{address}, #{email})

INSERT IGNORE INTO company (name, contact, contact_phone, address, email) VALUES
(#{item.name}, #{item.contact}, #{item.contactPhone}, #{item.address}, #{item.email})
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET name = #{name}, contact = #{contact}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, address = #{address}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
